Budget and Performance Committee meetings

Agendas, minutes and other papers for meetings of this committee may be accessed below. This committee - formerly the Budget Committee - was renamed the Budget and Performance Committee in July 2008. (Note: Budget Monitoring Sub-Committee meetings are listed separately.)
